function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete understanding of infectiousness changes over time","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of transmission dynamics and ineffective disease control measures","Mitigation":"Regularly update and validate the mathematical model with real-world data on infectiousness changes","Technologies":"Mathematical modeling, real-time data analytics","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate sensitivity and specificity of biosensors for COVID-19 detection","Impact":"False-negative or false-positive results, leading to ineffective disease management and resource wastage","Mitigation":"Rigorous testing and validation of biosensor performance, optimization of probe specificity and sensitivity","Technologies":"Biorecognition elements, sensor surface chemistry","People":"Biomedical engineers, researchers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Biotechnology companies, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of rapid and multiplexity in diagnostic tools for COVID-19","Impact":"Delayed detection of multiple biomarkers, hindering early diagnosis and treatment","Mitigation":"Development of rapid multiplex diagnostic platforms with high accuracy","Technologies":"Multiplex diagnostic platforms, rapid testing technologies","People":"Clinical diagnosticians, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Medical device manufacturers, research and development teams"}]}
